languages.text: "Цена победы, цена поражения всегда измеряется в пролитой крови. Дабы не растеклись по флагману алые реки завтра, даруй Неумирающему несколько капель сегодня".
"The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One but a few drops today, and he may prevent your flagship from running thick with scarlet rivers tomorrow."
languages.original_text: "Цена победы, цена поражения всегда измеряется в пролитой крови. Дабы не растеклись по флагману алые реки завтра, даруй Неумирающему несколько капель сегодня".

traits.locale_text: "The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One a few drops today test the scarlet rivers flow over the flagship tomorrow."
"The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One a few drops today test the scarlet rivers flow over the flagship tomorrow."
"The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One but a few drops today, and he may prevent your flagship running thick with scarlet rivers tomorrow."
"The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One but a few drops today, and he may prevent your flagship running thick with scarlet rivers tomorrow."
"The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One but a few drops today, and he may prevent your flagship from running thick with scarlet rivers tomorrow."
"The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One but a few drops today, and he may prevent your flagship from running thick with scarlet rivers tomorrow."

languages.text: "Der Preis von Sieg oder Niederlage wird immer in Blut gemessen. Gebt dem Todlosen heute nur wenige Tropfen, und er verhindert morgen möglicherweise, dass durch Euer Flaggschiff rote Ströme fließen."
languages.original_text: "The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One but a few drops today, and he may prevent your flagship from running thick with scarlet rivers tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: "Der Preis von Sieg oder Niederlage wird immer in Blut gemessen. Gebt dem Todlosen heute nur wenige Tropfen, und er verhindert morgen möglicherweise, dass durch Euer Flaggschiff rote Ströme fließen."

languages.text: «El precio de la victoria y de la derrota siempre se mide en sangre. Ofrezca hoy unas gotas al Inmortal y tal vez impida que ríos escarlata fluyan mañana por su nave insignia».
languages.original_text: "The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One but a few drops today, and he may prevent your flagship from running thick with scarlet rivers tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: «El precio de la victoria y de la derrota siempre se mide en sangre. Ofrezca hoy unas gotas al Inmortal y tal vez impida que ríos escarlata fluyan mañana por su nave insignia».

languages.text: 「勝利の値打ち、敗北の値打ちは、常に血で測られる。不死の者に今日ほんの数滴でも捧げれば、明日は旗艦が緋の川で染まるのを防げるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One but a few drops today, and he may prevent your flagship from running thick with scarlet rivers tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: 「勝利の値打ち、敗北の値打ちは、常に血で測られる。不死の者に今日ほんの数滴でも捧げれば、明日は旗艦が緋の川で染まるのを防げるかもしれない」

languages.text: “无论是胜利的代价，还是失败的代价，都要用鲜血衡量。此时此刻，为不死之神献上几滴鲜血，祂就会保佑你的旗舰日后不会血流成河。”
languages.original_text: "The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One but a few drops today, and he may prevent your flagship from running thick with scarlet rivers tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: “无论是胜利的代价，还是失败的代价，都要用鲜血衡量。此时此刻，为不死之神献上几滴鲜血，祂就会保佑你的旗舰日后不会血流成河。”

languages.text: « Le prix de la victoire, comme celui de la défaite, se mesure toujours à l'aune du sang versé. Offrez-en quelques gouttes à l'Immortel en ce jour, et il épargnera demain à votre navire amiral d'être submergé par des rivières pourpres. »
languages.original_text: "The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One but a few drops today, and he may prevent your flagship from running thick with scarlet rivers tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: « Le prix de la victoire, comme celui de la défaite, se mesure toujours à l'aune du sang versé. Offrez-en quelques gouttes à l'Immortel en ce jour, et il épargnera demain à votre navire amiral d'être submergé par des rivières pourpres. »

languages.text: "Galibiyetin de yenilginin de bedeli her daim kanla ölçülür. Bugün Ölmeyen'e kanından birkaç damla bağışlarsan o da sancak geminin yarın öbür gün kızıl nehirlerle dolup taşmasına mâni olabilir."
languages.original_text: "The price of victory, the price of defeat, is always measured in blood. Give the Undying One but a few drops today, and he may prevent your flagship from running thick with scarlet rivers tomorrow."
